amendment.description: To increase funding for reducing health disparities and promoting minority health.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 123 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 46. Record Vote Number: 20.
Amendment SA 123 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S1386-1389, S1401-1402; text: CR S1386-1387) To increase funding for reducing health disparities and promoting minority health.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 123 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 46. Record Vote Number: 20.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 123 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
